chat_room

Class ChatParticipant

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat_room.ChatParticipant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChatParticipant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object which plays a role of signal: when reading an instance of this class, this indicates that a new client has joined or an existing client has left. In this case the client with this instance name should be added to the list of clients of the allClientsMaintainer object, and also should be added to the chat participants area of each client (this is done through each client's singleClientHandler object which reads this instance.
    See Also:
